pages.text: $(li)Warped Fungus is a type of fungus that is commonly generated in Warped Forests.$(br)$(li)It can also be found in Crimson Forests.$(br)$(li)Warpbeetle can drop a Warped Fungus too.
$(li)It can be used to scared away Hoglins or attract Striders.$(br)$(li)With Warped Fungus mainly you can craft a Warped Fungus on a Stick, a Fungus & Tongue Stew.
